data.actual_result: You leave the server but for a split second it shows you have no friends
data.expected_result: You Leave the server and You see your friends list
data.short_description: When I leave a Server that's on the top of my server list it shows I have no Friends for a split second
data.steps_to_repro: - Move a server to the top of your server list - Leave the server that is on the top
